channel.title: Skill cape emotes
channel.description: so im trying to get skill cape emotes and i followed this tutorial and everything was fine. except i code the compile error. "Code too large" Well that was finally fixed. But now when i do the emotes they are totally wrong. Like the attack cape its just a cannon at my feet. -.- There where "anims" that was on the tutorial that i downloaded however it didnt say to do anything with them! Do i have to apply them some way? Please Help!

item.title: Skill cape emotes

item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

nope. their still glitched gimme a minute ill upload pics

Read full topic

item.title: Skill cape emotes
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

Put them in the anims folder in your client cache file.
Client >Cache >anims
Or somewhere around there

Read full topic

except i code the compile error. “Code too large” Well that was finally fixed. But now when i do the emotes they are totally wrong. Like the attack cape its just a cannon at my feet. -.-
